title: How to create an account?
description: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button and fill in the required information.

title: Is this website paid or free?
description: Our quiz website is free to use for only 14 days.

title: How to create a quiz?
description: To create a quiz, log in to your account and navigate to the 'Create Quiz' section. Follow the instructions to set up your quiz.
